p: The second model is the U.K. Met Office model HadGEM3‐GA3 (Walters et al., 2011). The integrations were run as part of the UPSCALE project (Mizielinski et al., 2014) and cover the period 1986–2011. The low‐resolution simulations were performed on a N216 grid, corresponding to roughly 60‐km grid spacing near the equator, while the high‐resolution simulations were done on a N512 grid, corresponding to roughly 25‐km grid spacing. Both configurations use 85 levels in the vertical.
